title: The Florescent Exhibit
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:midnight-rush]]
[[size larger]]“There is no exquisite beauty… without some strangeness in the proportion.” -Edgar Allan Poe [[/size]] 

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]


[[include component:image-block
| name=k.png
| caption=Junior Researcher Mason Flores
| width=WIDTH-GOES-HERE
| align=right]]


ㅤㅤㅤ→[[size larger]] Get To Know The Artist ! [[/size]]← 	
 ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ╰ ─┉─¡! • !¡─┉─                            ╯

My name is [[*user MasonFlores]] I like to draw mainly scary stuff. I may have like two artstyles i've been practicing in. I created this page to watch my art evolve throughout my time in drawing.  

 Just an info, the art I posted here falls under [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ Creative Commons] so make sure to atleast give credit by mentioning me^^
ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ
 Also If you explore this page get ready to see quotes either by Edgar Allan Poe or Fyodor Dostoevsky on the collapsible.





ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ

[[collapsible show="+ 457and054" hide="- Byebye"]]
[[image ok.png]]
>  “Deep in earth my love is lying , And I must weep alone.” -Edgar Allan Poe
>
> Cutesy Art shiz of the [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-457 burning man] and [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-054 water nymph]
[[/collapsible]]
[[collapsible show="+ SCP811" hide="- Byebye"]]
[[image eh.png]]
> “Invisible things are the only realities.” -Edgar Allan Poe
>
> This was my first time doing the cutesy art ([https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-811 SCP-811])
[[/collapsible]]
[[collapsible show="+ Sketch073" hide="- Byebye"]]
[[image l.png]]
>  “I say let the world go to hell, but I should always have my tea.” -Fyodor Dostoevsky
>
> Did a cat hack thing on [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-073 Cain]
[[/collapsible]]
[[collapsible show="+ Sketch953" hide="- Byebye"]]
[[image u.png]]
>  “But how could you live and have no story to tell?”  -Fyodor Dostoevsky
>  
> I am starting to run out of quotes lel ([https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-953 953]
[[/collapsible]]
[[collapsible show="+ Sketch076" hide="- Byebye"]]
[[image z.png]]
> I'll put more quotes if I am feeling creative now. 
>
> (or maybe not, who knows) ([https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-076 076]
[[/collapsible]]
[[collapsible show="+ Flores" hide="- Byebye"]]
[[image meh.png]]

>
